content: noventa cabled chunky hat by andrea riddle and lora marin materials 1 skein of chunky yarn with at least 90 yards malabrigo noventa in cereza was used for this pattern needles us 10 for the ribbing us 11 for the body of the hat us 11 double pointed needles or 32 for magic loop stitch marker using the german twisted cast on cast on 65 place marker and join in the round row 1-6 *k3 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2* repeat from * to * switch to us #11 needle row 7-8 *k3 p2 k6 p2* repeat from * to * row 9 *k3 p2 3/3lc p2* repeat from * to * row 10 - 14 *k3 p2 k6 p2* repeat from * to * 5 row row 15 cable row repeat row 9 repeat row 10 to-15 two more times you have 4 cable twists repeat row 10 & 11 start the hat decreases row 1 *k3 p2tog k6 p2tog* repeat * to * row 2 *k3 p1 k6 p1* repeat * to * row 3 *cdd p1 k6 p1* repeat * to * row 4 *k1 p1 3/3cdl p1* repeat * to * cdl= hold 3 sts in front k1 k2tog knit 3 from cable needle row 5 *k1 p1 k2tog k1 ssk* repeat * to * end p1 row 6 *k1 p1 ccd p1* repeat * to * row 7 *k2tog ssk* repeat * to * cut yarn and pull through the last 10 stitches sew in ends and enjoy your new hat abbreviations 3/3 lc 3 over 3 left cross slip 3 sts onto the cable needle and hold in front k3 then k3 from cable needle cdd center double decrease slip 2 sts knitwise onto right needle k1 pass slipped stitches over the k1 two stitches decreased 3/3 cdl hold 3 sts in front of the cable needle k1 k2tog knit 3 from the cable needle k knit p purl k2tog knit two together ssk slip knitwise slip knit knitwise knit them together thru back loop
